doc:body.p: Companies and partners with whom I continue to work or whom I am happy to look back on for our good collaboration:

p.b: Development of the next generation of the manufacturing information system Hercules 5.0.

ul.li: Architecture of a modular system for resale to other clients.
Software development, processing and migration of old data, solving technical challenges.
Project planning and leading the development team.
Administration of application servers and databases.

dd.p:
Dendera a.s. specializes in manufacturing from steel, sheets, and profiles using laser and CNC technologies.
Thanks to the Zatloukal family for their approach. As one of the few clients, they knew exactly what they wanted.

p.b: We have been collaborating with Smart-CON for a long time and have developed several applications together.

ul.li: R-WEBDOG - client system for managing, remote access, and control of advertisements in mobile routers deployed in buses and trains.
Teleagenda - internal billing system for SIM card billing and contract management.
XEROX - oversight and development of a client sales portal for special offers for Czech XEROX.

dd.p: Smart-CON specializes in wireless communication, industrial routers, and 5G networks.

Lecturer activities.
ICT Pro and other training companies are leading educational agencies in the Czech Republic.
LearnQuest provides training for multinational foreign corporations.

ul.li:
Implementation of TOP courses for the most demanding clients and companies with professional development teams:
IBM, Microsoft, Česká spořitelna, Komerční banka, Seznam.cz, Avast, Esset, Bosh, Foxconn, Quadient, and many others.
Courses taught in Czech at home or in English abroad.
Over 150 courses completed in {php echo 2022 - 2008; } years.
Implementation of courses according to curricula or tailored to client needs.

dd.p: We also collaborated with ICTPro s.r.o. for a long time on the development of an information system.

a.title: Výzkumný ústav veterinárního lékařství, v. v. i.

p.b: Development of a web portal for the Veterinary Research Institute,

dd.p:
for the Department of Pharmacology, Immunotherapy, and Nanotoxicology (PIN).
I developed the portal using the Pimcore CMS publishing system.

p.b: Development of an international portal for plastic surgeons and their clients.

dd.p:
Working for Estheticon was a challenge for me. The company manages a wide range of clients on its Estheticon.com portal.
The portal is available in 14 languages and its development is the company's core business.

ul.li: Developed JavaScript components and coded HTML/CSS for the company's web applications.
Designed website redesigns and coded HTML templates.
Prepared web advertisements and print materials.

dd.p:
Tripomatic currently focuses on map applications, trip planning, and excursions.
In the past, we developed a flight search aggregator.

ul.li: Developed JavaScript components and coded HTML/CSS for the company's websites.
Designed website redesigns and coded HTML templates.
Prepared web advertisements and print materials.
Produced commercial video spots and post-production.

dd.p: It was a great opportunity at the start of my career, where I gained a lot of experience in many different fields - marketing, graphic design, and IT.
Today, the multinational company operates in many sectors - selling airline tickets, bus and train transportation, facilitating work, language, and au-pair stays, and much more.

doc:body.p: Thanks to all the other companies and individuals who collaborated but couldn't fit here.
